languages.text: "Не советую вам этого делать, Вольный Торговец. Вы не остановите машину правосудия, ибо ее жернова уже приведены в движение, и лишь усугубите свое положение".

"I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."
languages.original_text: "Не советую вам этого делать, Вольный Торговец. Вы не остановите машину правосудия, ибо ее жернова уже приведены в движение, и лишь усугубите свое положение".

traits.locale_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness would only worsen your situation further."

"I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness would only worsen your situation further."

"I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

languages.text: "Ich würde Euch das nicht empfehlen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr könnt die Maschine der Gerechtigkeit nicht stoppen, denn ihre Mühlsteine wurde bereits in Bewegung gesetzt. Eine derartige Unbesonnenheit erschwert Eure Situation nur."
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euch das nicht empfehlen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr könnt die Maschine der Gerechtigkeit nicht stoppen, denn ihre Mühlsteine wurde bereits in Bewegung gesetzt. Eine derartige Unbesonnenheit erschwert Eure Situation nur."

languages.text: « Je vous déconseille vivement d'employer cette méthode, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Il est impossible d'arrêter la machine de la justice une fois qu'elle s'est mise en branle. Ce genre d'action irréfléchie ne fera qu'aggraver votre cas. »
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous déconseille vivement d'employer cette méthode, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Il est impossible d'arrêter la machine de la justice une fois qu'elle s'est mise en branle. Ce genre d'action irréfléchie ne fera qu'aggraver votre cas. »

languages.text: “我不建议你这么做，行商浪人。你无法阻止正义的力量。正义的武装已经启动，这样的鲁莽行为只会让你的处境变得更加糟糕。”
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

traits.locale_text: “我不建议你这么做，行商浪人。你无法阻止正义的力量。正义的武装已经启动，这样的鲁莽行为只会让你的处境变得更加糟糕。”

languages.text: «Le recomiendo que cambie de parecer, Comerciante Independiente. La maquinaria de la justicia ya está en marcha, inexorable como ruedas de molino. Su temeridad no puede sino empeorar su situación».
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

traits.locale_text: «Le recomiendo que cambie de parecer, Comerciante Independiente. La maquinaria de la justicia ya está en marcha, inexorable como ruedas de molino. Su temeridad no puede sino empeorar su situación».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、そのような行動はお勧めしません。正義という機構の歯車はすでに回り始めており、もはや止めることはできません。そのような軽率な行いは、事態をさらに悪化させるだけです」
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、そのような行動はお勧めしません。正義という機構の歯車はすでに回り始めており、もはや止めることはできません。そのような軽率な行いは、事態をさらに悪化させるだけです」

languages.text: "Bu eğilimi hiç tasvip etmiyorum Hür Tacir. Adalet dediğimiz makineye engel olamazsınız. Zira çarkları çoktan dönmeye başladı. Böylesi bir düşüncesizlik, daha vahim bir duruma düşmenize sebep olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I do not recommend this course of action, Rogue Trader. You cannot stop the machine of justice, for its millstones have already been set in motion. Such rashness will only worsen your situation further."

traits.locale_text: "Bu eğilimi hiç tasvip etmiyorum Hür Tacir. Adalet makinesine engel olamazsınız. Zira çarkları çoktan dönmeye başladı. Böylesi bir düşüncesizlik daha vahim bir duruma düşmenize sebep olacaktır."
